main event: A luminous rectangular object was observed in the sky over Switzerland on September 13, 1953.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5 to 10 minutes.,The object was said to be four times as long as the wing of a passenger plane.,It had a combination of aluminum bronze and dark colors, with no visible engines.,The observer noted the object traveled silently at a speed of about 1,500 m/sec.,The object disappeared completely in about a seventh of a second.
